meetup.title: Automating platform with Kubernetes in Spotahome
meetup.abstract: We'll talk about the challenges we are facing in Spotahome in order to maintain and deliver a toil-less platform based on Kubernetes. Also, We'll explain how to extend Kubernetes with operators, CRDs, and APIs to manage clusters and build bridges between engineers and the platform, reducing overhead in the operative tasks while improving security and reliability in a continuous delivery environment.
